Articles.Content:
Hey Guys! Want to see a cool project me and a few friends have been working on?

I have teamed up with 4 other youtubers, we've used BD armoury and divided up the bases of kerbin side, all so we can gather some troops and go to WAR!!

This first installment discusses defenses, base locations and "weather" satellites

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/gqtwz7WGXrY?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Crystal sharp pictures of your enemy's bases from orbit may well tell you what is going on, but it's not the same as the visceral experience of flying down and seeing for yourself.. 

Then It's time to show the world our true power as we break out The Grub, Carried by the Platypus

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/Hr-tHaUy0gM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The war is starting to hot up, bases are being taken but so far we have remained unscathed, but with rumors of traitors in our ranks we must take decisive action to make sure that we are the ones to emerge victorious

For too long (1 round) now our enemies have sat at our borders, amassing strength and numbers, for the sake of our children we cannot and will not let this continue

Join myself and Twit Jong-I as we try to take all of the entire kerbinside base list, whilst defending our own territory from the vicious wants of 4 other players

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/38SCM4AkukI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Excitement is high as the entire nation of northern Klathuu prepares itself for the biggest celebration in the social calendar LEADER DAY!!

Giant crowds have gathered at the KSC and all of Dear leaders military prowess will be taking part in the grand parade to celebrate his greatness

oh and there is some of this war thing that is going on ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) 

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/9StQjikil6w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

The time has come to say good by to one of our number. The honorable emperor of Velox, Keeper of the peninsula of East Klathuu has passed on

Klathuu state tv reports on this weeks hostilities and celebrations and you are all mandated to watch.. NO EXCEPTIONS!!

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/iL86EjmJUZg?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
